long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension help YouTube streamer to interact with viewer by live chat much easier.
The extension capture messages on live chat and animate the messages in defined manner.
Viewer can change the color/animating direction/font-size by sending the messages in dedicated pattern/manner.
The extension also provide another function on playing sound with given pattern found on the message.

Special thanks to Sephira Su for all the inspiration.
このプラグインは、セフィラ・スゥさんによって作り上げましたものです。
彼女に最大限の感謝を。
そして、記憶を戻した彼女に祝福を。
